attributes.action: Ban the use of generative AI in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Gen AI is a plague on today’s society. Image creation is being used in malicious ways - such as creating nude images of underage children - and it is also removing the humanity of the online space. It puts hard working artists out of jobs and the internet is full of uncanny images that our children are growing up to be rotted by. Not to mention the environmental and energy impact AI has and the dangers it holds on the future. People now no longer know if what they are seeing is real or fake.
attributes.background: Ban the use of generative AI - especially image and video creation - in the UK

rejection.details: You may be interested in this petition, which calls for similar action: "Ban the use of AI for image, video and audio creation" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751635
